alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 10:27PM EST until February 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for a portion of the following river in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette downstream to Riverton. .Lowland flooding continues along much of the Wabash River, from Lafayette down to Riverton. There is potential for flooding to develop later in the week at Vincennes. The crest is currently at Lafayette and rising at all locations south of Lafayette. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Clinton. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lowland flooding in progress. River water runs through the City of Clinton`s wastewater treatment plant. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.2 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Sunday afternoon by around 130 PM EST /1230 PM CST/.
